title: Synchronize contacts, calendar, and what to do when cannot be synchronized
answer:
Sync contacts must log at least one Exchange Account. 

Set > Account > Add account > E-mail, enter your account number, password, click manually, select **Exchange **From email service providers Website to check the mailbox server configuration, complete the configuration and land successfully. 

Access the main menu, select **settings** > **Company**** **, Select Synchronize account and tick the options need to be synchronized; then click the menu button > **Sync now**** **, Sync content selected from the server to your mobile phone. 

If you sync contacts failed, then check if your cellular data connection is turned on, and if the mailbox server supports contact synchronization.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150601151307224001.gif)
